briefTitle: Quality of Life, Aesthetic Result and Health Economy in Breast Reconstruction
officialTitle: GoBreast - a Prospective Randomized Trial on Breast Reconstruction Methods
eligibilityCriteria:
Irradiated patients:

Inclusion Criteria:

* Age 18-60
* DIEP is technically possible
* Unilateral mastectomy
* BMI\<30

Exclusion Criteria:

* Scars on abdomen or back
* Bilateral mastectomy
* Previous liposuction abdomen
* 61 years of age or older

Non-irradiated patients

Inclusion Criteria:

-\>18 years of age

* Unilateral mastectomy
* BMI\<30

Exclusion Criteria:

* Bilateral mastectomy
* extensive scars on thorax
